column4: in terminal  sudo mkdir /etc/Wireless then sudo mkdir /etc/Wireless/RT2860STA then  sudo cp RT2860STA.dat /etc/Wireless/RT2860STA
cp: cannot stat `RT2860STA.dat': No such file or directory
you have to be in the dir where the dat file is
